scripts.test: yarn webpack-node && yarn run-vscode-test && yarn run-unit-test
scripts.webpack-dev-deploy: yarn webpack-dev && gulp deploy-web && gulp fixOutWebPackageContents
scripts.webpack: yarn webpack:build && yarn build:webpack && gulp deploy-web
scripts.deploy-node: yarn compile-port-forwarder && yarn compile-liveshare-hub && yarn compile-speaker && gulp deploy-node

scripts.webpack-node: yarn webpack:build && yarn build:webpack-node && yarn deploy-node
scripts.webpack-node-dev: yarn webpack:build && yarn build:webpack-node --mode=development && yarn deploy-node
